field.name: guestEnable
field.label: Enabled for guests
field.description: Should Filepicker be enabled for guests?

field.name: guestEnableUploads
field.label: Enabled uploads for guests
field.description: Should uploading be enabled for guests?

field.name: guestRootPath
field.label: Rootpath for guests
field.description: Which should be the root path of the filemanager?

field.name: guestFileExtensions
field.label: Legal file extensions viewing for guests
field.description: Which file extensions are allowed for viewing for guests, if configuration settings are not used?

field.name: guestFileExtensionsUpload
field.label: Legal file extensions for uploading for guests
field.description: Which file extensions are allowed to be uploaded for guests, if configuration settings are not used?

field.name: FileImages
field.label: Images for filetypes
field.description: Comma or enter seperated list of filetype with image reference. Use {ComponentImagePath} as a placeholder of /components/com_filepicker/assets/images/filetypes/.

field.name: DefaultFileImage
field.label: Default file image
field.description: Image which should be loaded for file extensions, which are not supported 'Images for filetypes'. Use {ComponentImagePath} as a placeholder of /components/com_filepicker/assets/images/filetypes/.
